trans-unit.source: Represents a control that creates a container that has a border and a header for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: 代表建立容器的控制項有框線和標題作為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]內容。

trans-unit.source: GroupBox is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>, which means its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> properties can be of any type (such as string, image, or panel).
trans-unit.target: GroupBox 是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>，這表示其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A>屬性可以是任何類型 （例如字串、 影像或面板）。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl> class.

The following illustration is an example of a GroupBox that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that are enclosed in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 下圖是包含的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>，而且<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>會括住<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> GroupBox 的範例

trans-unit.source: ![GroupBoxImage](~/add/media/groupboximage.JPG "GroupBoxImage") ## Customizing the GroupBox Control To apply the same property settings to multiple GroupBox controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ![GroupBoxImage](~/add/media/groupboximage.JPG "GroupBoxImage") # # GroupBox 控制項以自訂適用於多個 GroupBox 控制項使用相同的屬性設定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 您可以修改預設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>來提供獨特的外觀的控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，請參閱[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the GroupBox, see [GroupBox Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的組件和專屬於群組方塊的狀態，請參閱[GroupBox 樣式和範本](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。
如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in GroupBox control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只會影響如果該屬性會出現在 GroupBox 控制項的預設範本，並使用設定的。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: 您可以找到的視覺屬性清單中的 「 變更 Visual 結構的控制項 」 一節中[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Responds when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey*> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"></xref> is pressed.
Creates an implementation of <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"></xref> control.
